attributes.action: Delay in the Justice system is denial of justice
attributes.additional_details: Police investigation is an important process leading to an early justice with equity, which is sense of belonging to all share or stake holders.The new dimensions in the organized crime of the old crime is on increase, due to the systemic failure in POLICING. Discrimination, racism is one of the corrupt practices in Hackney Police command. Since i was brutalized by the Hackney police, 4 years ago, they have started manufacturing conspiracy theory, with motives & intent, delaying investigation, tampering with all my evidences by contacting all process for my legal redress. The police activity is now a threat to my life now, Conspiring to hack into my net and stealing my intellectual documents as a consultant Engineer/ Project Manager.I have receive no letter from the met. I want the government so set up an inquiry to look into all activities, please.Thanks
